New Records: Elly De La Cruz became the 3rd player in MLB history to have 100 stolen bases in their first two big league seasons.
Elly De La Cruz joined the 100 steals/100 extra-base hits club in his first two seasons in the big leagues, achieving this faster than anyone else.
Elly De La Cruz set a new record for most strikeouts in a season for the Cincinnati Reds with 206 strikeouts.
Key Match Events: Elly De La Cruz stole his 65th base of the season in the 4th inning.
Nick Martinez dominated in the Reds' 8-3 win over Pittsburgh.
